about_the_game:
Step into the shadows with this free DLC for Blade Prince Academy, introducing Kleff the Rat Assassin. This cunning new character focuses on physical damage to single targets with his exceptional attack speed. Kleff's spells include armor debuffs and several support abilities designed to trigger devastating combos during missions.

Kleff comes with his own narrative arc and unique character dialogues to discover throughout the base game

Spells
  • Armor Debuff: Weaken enemy defenses, making them more vulnerable to your attacks.
  • Position Switch Spell: Swap places with an ally or enemy, creating dynamic positioning advantages.
  • Fog Zone Creation: Conjure fog zones to obscure vision, perfect for setting up devastating combos.
  • Status Effects: Inflict poison, bleeding, and resistance debuffs to steadily wear down your foes.
  • Fatigue Management: Kleff inflicts Fatigue on himself regularly, but his combo effects can remove these debuffs, adding an extra layer of strategy.

How to unlock Kleff
  • Unlocked automatically from sector 2.
  • Starts at level 3, ready to join your team with a head start.
